events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to wrong item delivery in the customer's order.
Support agent Sarah M. has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and would like to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number: 879654321. I have also attached the photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate how fast you are handling my refund request.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. If you need any further assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since you have confirmed receipt of your refund, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on your experience with the refund process.
